definition: according to/to act in accordance with/to depend on/to seize/to occupy

sentences.english: Police reportedly also questioned school staff about the slogan-writing graffiti incident.
sentences.chinese: 據聞警方還就亂塗亂畫標語事件向學校職員詢問。

sentences.english: Apple is reportedly about to introduce a new digitaltabletstablet.
sentences.chinese: 據聞蘋果將會引進一種新的電子平板。

sentences.english: He is said to have died of a cardiac arrest at his home in Los Angeles on Thursday.
sentences.chinese: 據聞他是週四在洛杉磯的家中突然心跳停止而死亡。
